attributes.action: Free British sign language for those who have hearing impairments and there family
attributes.additional_details:
People say those who are deaf need free sign language classes,But what about those who are going to be deaf in the future..Yes age is always something that can cause deafness but I mean other hearing impairments before old age becomes the issue
This is more for the people who are not fully deaf so those with:
Conductive hearing loss:
-Otosclerosis
-Perforated eardrum)

Sensorineural hearing loss
-Genetic hearing loss
-Acoustic trauma
-Ménière's disease
-Acoustic neuroma
-Meningitis
-Encephaliti
-Multiple sclerosis
-Stroke's

These are some of the many unknown reasons for hearing loss and hearing impairments
